title: Reheated Cabbage
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: I get up and I'm a bit edgy in the next pub, but I concentrate  on Lucy, blacking out all the queer goings-on around us. We have another couple of beers, then decide to go for a pizza at Pizza Express to soak up some of the booze. — It's weird that we haven't met before, you being one of Charlie's closest mates – Lucy considers.
